summary: This module provides a utility function to convert IPv6 addresses to ASCII string representation in an uncompressed format. The function takes an IPv6 address as input and outputs a colon-separated hexadecimal format string.

logs.reason: This is a format string used to convert the IPv6 address to a colon-separated hexadecimal string. While not a log message itself, failures in this function might be logged by calling functions.
logs.resolution: If errors occur when formatting IPv6 addresses, check that the IPv6 address provided is valid and that the destination buffer has sufficient space.
